ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We gave them the clarifying Book
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We gave them the explicit Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We granted them a Clear Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We gave them the enlightening Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We bestowed the clear Book to both of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We gave them the clear Scripture;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We gave them both the Book that made (things) clear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We gave them the Manifesting Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We gave them the clear Scripture
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and We gave them the Book which helps to make things clear;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We vouchsafed Unto the twain a Book luminous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We gave them the illuminating scripture
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We gave them the Book which helps to make things clear;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We gave them the clear Scripture;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and We gave them the Clear Book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We gave them the Clarifying Scripture.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We gave them the explicit Scripture,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:117] And We gave them the enlightening scripture, the one whose statements concerning prescribed punishments and rulings and otherwise are excellently expressed — this is the Torah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We gave them the clear Scripture) We gave them the Torah which made clear the lawful and the unlawful,
